name: Neologize
description:
More a desktop toy you keep alongside your chosen social network chat routes than a full-screen application.

Challenge your friends for explanations and example use of random, etymologically-correct neologisms.

* * *

A game of making up words,
defining them,
and using them with your friends.

A collection of over 500 prefixes, ~700 suffixes, +1000 word stems,
generates a new word for you,
creating one that has never ever existed before.

Etymologically correct, unique.

Find new meanings. Use in your personal writing.
Discover how malleable the English language can become.

Soon your personal dictionary fills with new, never previously seen or used entries.

Go creative in the way you speak.
Outvocabulate me bro.
